skill.name: Eviscerate
skill.description: You tear into all enemies directly in front of you, leaving them bleeding for 6 seconds. Base range is 2.7 meters within a 120 degree arc. Eviscerate has a 67% Charge rate penalty.

tiers.tier:
Range increased to 3 meters and arc to 180 degrees
Bleeding is amplified over a shorter, 4 second duration

Range increased to 3.3 meters and arc to 240 degrees
Bleeding amplified over a shorter, 2 second duration

skill.name: Howl
skill.description: You howl in fury, filling nearby foes with terror. Affected foes are slowed and become less able to defend themselves for several seconds.

skill.name: Raze
skill.description: You perform a devastating uppercut that inflicts heavy damage on a single target. With each successive hit, you grow in power. Raze does not generate Charge.

skill.name: Wolfstrike
skill.description: You lunge forward in a 6 meter dash, claws slashing, rending all foes in your path.

skill.name: Battle Rage
skill.description: You enter an enraged state during which your damage is amplified based on the number of foes within 4 meters. The rage lasts for 60 seconds.

tiers.tier: Damage you take is also reduced by foe proximity

skill.name: Rupture
skill.description: You knock a single enemy back with a devastating strike. After a brief delay, the target explodes, damaging all foes within 4 meters.

skill.name: Ravage
skill.description: You execute a brutal series of slashes, inflicting three strikes on all foes within 4 meters. Enemy armor is weakened with each strike.

tiers.tier: You are immune to knockback and slowing effects while casting Ravage
Armor weakness duration is extended to 6 seconds

skill.name: Blood Hunger
skill.description: Whenever you land a critical strike with a melee weapon, you draw life essence from the carnage, healing your wounds.

skill.name: Executioner
skill.description: Your ferocity in combat enables you to more frequently strike with two weapons at once. When you successfully execute, you gain Charge more quickly for a short period of time.

skill.name: Rampage
skill.description:
Each enemy you kill with a melee weapon has a chance of spurring you into an adrenaline-fueled rampage.
Faster Attack for 5 seconds
25% Cast Speed for 5 seconds
12% Movement Speed for 5 seconds

skill.name: Frost Breath
skill.description: You channel the frigid north winds to unleash a blast of icy breath, which immobilizes enemies and makes them more susceptible to damage. The blast reaches 5 meters at a 90 degree angle.

tiers.tier: Range is increased to 6 meters at a 120 degree angle.
Range is increased to 7 meters at a 150 degree angle.
Range is increased to 8 meters at a 150 degree angle. Allows use of health and mana steal abilities.

skill.name: Stormclaw
skill.description: You imbue your weapons with an electrical energy. This power can cause a lightning bolt to arc toward nearby targets when you strike a foe. The lightning can chain up to 2 times.

tiers.tier: Lightning can chain up to 3 times
Lightning can chain up to 4 times
Lightning can chain up to 5 times

skill.name: Storm Hatchet
skill.description: You draw wild northern lightning out of your weapon to create an electrical throwing axe with a range of 15 meters.

tiers.tier: Hatchet range is increased to 20 meters and it flies faster

skill.name: Northern Rage
skill.description: You unleash an arctic blast from deep inside you, throwing out shards of ice to knock back and freeze nearby foes.

tiers.tier: The blast is strengthened to 4 fissures that travel further than the base skill
The blast is strengthened to 5 fissures that travel further than tier I
The blast is strengthened to 6 fissures that travel further than tier II

skill.name: Ice Shield
skill.description: You call forth an ice shield which reflects projectile missiles back at attackers. You also have a chance to gain 10% of your Charge Bar when the shield is struck. The shield lasts for 10 seconds.

tiers.tier: The shield reflects 75% of the missile damage
The shield reflects 100% of the missile damage
The shield reflects 125% of the missile damage

skill.name: Permafrost
skill.description: The bone-cracking cold of the north expands outward from you, slowly sapping the life of all foes within 16 meters.

tiers.tier: Adds a 25% chance to Freeze foes for 6 seconds
Adds a 25% chance to completely immobilize foes for 6 seconds
Chance to immobilize foes is increased to 50%

skill.name: Glacial Shatter
skill.description: The earth is sundered and 5 geysers burst forth at the target location, blinding and damaging foes with superheated air and water.

skill.name: Cold Steel Mastery
skill.description: The only thing harder than steel is cold steel. Increases melee and frost damage.

skill.name: Shatter Storm
skill.description: When you kill frozen enemies, you blast nearby foes in a 4 meter ring of frost, leaving them more susceptible to further ice attacks.

skill.name: Rage Retaliation
skill.description: When you are struck by a nearby enemy, your inner rage physically manifests and retaliates against that foe. Damage is equal to 120% of your weapon's DPS. Individual targets can only be hit once per second at most.

skill.name: Shadow Burst
skill.description: You transform into a spectral wolf and lunge through your enemies, damaging them even as you heal your own body. The healing is limited to a maximum of 2 targets per Burst.

tiers.tier: Healing can be derived from 3 targets per Burst. Chance to destroy shields is increased to 50%.
Healing can be derived from 4 targets per Burst. Chance to destroy shields is increased to 75%.
Healing can be derived from 5 targets per Burst. Chance to destroy shields is increased to 100%.

skill.name: Wolf Shade
skill.description: You summon a Wolf Shade ally to sink its icy fangs into your enemies and heal you with their lifeforce. The Shade can be summoned once every minute.

skill.name: Shadowbind
skill.description: You bind a group of foes within a 5 meter radius of your target location. All your subsequent melee attacks transfer a percentage of damage to all shadowbound targets.

tiers.tier: Radius of effect increased to 7 meters
Radius of effect increased to 9 meters
Radius of effect increased to 11 meters

skill.name: Savage Rush
skill.description: The shadow wolf spirit overtakes you! While the skill remains active, you dash continuously through foes, leaving them bleeding in your wake.

tiers.tier: Enemy Armor decreased by 20% for 6 seconds
Enemy Armor decreased by 30% for 8 seconds
Enemy Armor decreased by 40% for 10 seconds

skill.name: Chain Snare
skill.description: Spearing all enemies within 6 meters, you draw them swiftly into melee range.

skill.name: Battle Standard
skill.description: The ancient standard of your tribe imbues you and your allies with increased evasion, resistance to knockback, and increased charge gain while within its 9 meter influence.

skill.name: Wolfpack
skill.description: You unleash a pack of 5 spectral wolves that spread out and attack enemies all around you.

skill.name: Frenzy Mastery
skill.description: Your feral nature grows more powerful and harder to suppress, increasing the duration of your Frenzy states (acquired from filling the Charge Bar).

skill.name: Shred Armor
skill.description: Your inner savagery rips into your enemies' armor, leaving them more vulnerable with each hit, while at the same time stealing some of their armor for yourself.

skill.name: Red Wolf
skill.description: Whenever you inflict a critical hit, up to two neighboring enemies may be savaged by a manifestation of your bloodlust.
